title: Implement OAuth2 Authentication for API Gateway
description:
As a user, I want to securely authenticate using OAuth2 so that my credentials are protected.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Support OAuth2 authorization code flow
- Implement JWT token validation
- Add token refresh mechanism
- Support multiple identity providers (Google, GitHub)
- Include rate limiting for auth endpoints

title: Add Redis Caching Layer for User Service
description:
Implement Redis caching to improve user service response times.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Cache user profile data with 1-hour TTL
- Implement cache invalidation on user updates
- Add cache hit/miss metrics
- Handle cache failures gracefully
- Add configuration for cache settings

title: Fix Memory Leak in Background Job Processor
description:
Memory usage increases continuously in the job processor, causing OOM crashes after 24 hours.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Start job processor
2. Monitor memory usage over 24 hours
3. Observe steady increase from 500MB to 4GB

Expected: Memory should stabilize around 500-800MB
Actual: Memory increases to 4GB and causes crash

title: Create Automated Test Suite for Payment Service
description:
Develop comprehensive automated tests for the payment service.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Unit tests for payment processing logic
- Integration tests with payment gateway
- Mock external payment APIs
- Achieve 80%+ code coverage
- Add tests to CI/CD pipeline

title: Implement Database Connection Pooling
description:
Add connection pooling to reduce database connection overhead and improve performance.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Implement HikariCP connection pool
- Configure min/max pool sizes
- Add connection timeout settings
- Monitor pool metrics
- Document configuration options
